pageContext.claim: “But this guy, Sondland, hardly know him. I've had a couple of conversations with him. I see him hanging around, you know, when I go to Europe. But he was really the European Union ambassador, and all of a sudden he's working on this, and, you know, ask about that.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often “hardly knows” people who provide less than favorable information. Sondland not only was a mega-donor to the president’s campaign and his hand chosen ambassador, but he testified that about meetings and calls with the president and other top administration officials about how to push for these investigations in Ukraine.
